code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./AuthPages.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AgentLogin=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/agent/login?email=".concat(email,"&password=").concat(password));if(response.ok){const agentData=await response.json();localStorage.setItem('agentData',JSON.stringify(agentData));navigate('/agent-dashboard');}else{setError('Invalid email or password');}}catch(error){setError('Login failed.
